HomePage.concept:
It is better to learn cases than to learn theory 
It is better to learn from cases than to do them
It is better to play with cases than to make cases
Playing alone is worse than playing together
It is better to gather the best and most talented teachers from all over the world to play together

Hero.title: Educational Innovation in an Era of Change
Hero.subtitle: Explore new paradigms of education: practice-driven, project-oriented, elite aggregation, and collaborative win-win
Hero.tagline: Cultivating versatile talents with global vision and innovative spirit
